CREATOR: Elena Kagan ( CN=Elena Kagan/OU=OPD/O=EOP        [OPD ]   )

SUBJECT:     attached

TO: Bruce N. Reed       ( CN=Bruce N. Reed/OU=OPD/O=EOP @ EOP   [ OPD ]   )
READ:UNKNOWN

TEXT:
I'm attaching a draft invitation to our next dpc meeting.

==================== ATTACHMENT     1 ====================

MEMORANDUM FOR THE DOMESTIC POLICY COUNCIL

FROM:                    BRUCE REED

SUBJECT:                 FEBRUARY MEETING

        There will be a meeting of the Domestic Policy Council on Thursday, February 13 from
2:00 to 3:00 p.m. in the Roosevelt Room.

        As you recall, at the last cabinet meeting, Erskine asked each Secretary to review second-
term priorities in light of the President's State of the Union address. He has asked the various
Policy Councils to meet with their member agencies in order to discuss these priorities. I hope to
use this discussion to seek your help on a number of concrete projects, including promoting the
President's 10-point education plan, creating work opportunities for welfare recipients, and
providing assistance to the D.C. government. I also will give you an update and seek further
advice on the 0-3 conference we talked about at our last meeting.

       Please have your staff provide any necessary clearance information to Cathy Mays (456-
6515). If you have any questions about the meeting, please contact me (456-6515) or my Deputy,
Elena Kagan (456-5584).




                                                                         Automated Records Management System
                                                                         Hex-Dump Conversion
